channel.title: I need some1!
channel.description:
C1: Need some1 to make me a server C2: Help me on hosting.
I need some1 who could make me a server using ultimate pk or something like that, i want that server but make the name friendly scape.
Please i really need some1 to do this since i dont no how, and i want my own server.
who ever does this for me they can be admin on it.
i also want the ip to be something like
friendly-scape. {what ever here}
Please and Please and Please do this for me! Thanks.
also i am not lazy i have tried...but it will not work..
[b][u]C2[/u][/b]
also can u tell me how to host a server and what like to do because i have the ultimate pk server and stuff...and it works for me on 0.0.0.0 port 5555 but...when i register it on moparscape thing. it says its offline when im on it...so could you either do what it says at the top or help me do this!

item.title: I need some1!
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Post this here. It’s not related to MoparScape, it’s your own server. Therefor should be posted in the Server Development section.

Also you’ll get more help there.

Read full topic
